title: New: The Candescents – Back of Your Hand
content:
By the looks of The Candescents shows, they’re pretty into the house party scene.

Their snarling debut single, Back of Your Hand is immensely memorable for what it is; 2 minutes of Arctic Monkeys and The Vines indebted garage rock, self described as ‘rock music that’ll drive yo momma nuts’. Judging a band on two minutes of music is pretty dangerous, but there’s definitely something rather exciting about the Columbus quartet.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
